Home.title: Autism Communication Assistant
Home.subtitle: Empowering parents to better communicate with and understand their children through AI-assisted tools and structured interactions.

Profile.title: Child Profile
Profile.no_profile: No profile yet. Let's create one to get started with personalized communication assistance.
Profile.name: Name
Profile.delete_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}'s profile? This action cannot be undone.
Profile.sensory_response_description: Does the child have any special reactions to sounds, lights, or touch?
Profile.special_interests_description: Does the child have any special interests, including colors, toys, or activities?
Profile.environmental_response_description: Does the child show discomfort or emotional reactions in certain environments?

Scenarios.title: Communication Scenarios
Scenarios.no_scenarios: No scenarios yet. Let's create one to start personalized communication assistance.
Scenarios.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this scenario? This action cannot be undone.
Scenarios.create_profile_first: Please create a child profile first before adding scenarios.
Scenarios.no_scenarios_yet: No scenarios yet. Click one of the buttons above to create one.
Scenarios.delete_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to delete {name}'s scenario? This action cannot be undone.

chat.title: AI Scenario Assistant
chat.welcome_message: Hello! I'm your AI assistant. I can help you create communication scenarios based on your description. Please describe a situation or scenario you'd like help with.
chat.error_message: Sorry, there was an error generating the scenario. Please try again.
chat.empty_message: Please enter a description to generate a scenario.
chat.save_error: Failed to save scenario. Please try again.

Chat.title: Simulated Conversation
Chat.placeholder: Type your message or select a suggested response...
Chat.initialize_conversion: Initializing Conversation(no response from this person)
